committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to extend the Wetlands Loan Act, and for other purposes.

summary.as: House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment
summary.text: (House agreed to Senate amendment with an amendment (pursuant to H. Res. 589)) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to develop and implement a plan to relocate and manage an experimental population of California sea otters, subject to specified requirements with respect to location, number, age, and sex of members of the population and the manner of capture, transport, and release. States that land purchases for the Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana, shall be made from appropriations Acts. Amends the Duck Stamp Act to modify the sale of migratory bird hunting and conservation stamps (hunting permits) according to amounts available for obligation in the Migratory Bird Conservation Fund. Directs the Secretaries of the Interior and of Agriculture to convey to New Hampshire without reimbursement the Berlin National Fish Hatchery for use by the New Hampshire Fish and Game Department.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Wetlands Loan Act, and for other purposes.
